name: Power-Q
description:
Navigate your robot through 8 dungeons. Destroy your enemies and don't run out of power! Battle 3 distinct enemy types in a friendly pixel art environment with a chill soundtrack and immersive soundscape.

This game is in late beta. I'm releasing it soon for iOS, so I really appreciate feedback!

Power-Q is a polished version of PoweRL, my Ludum Dare 39 entry.

>> Want to be an iOS beta tester? Email me! <<
